title: LAFA: Agentic LLM-Driven Federated Analytics over Decentralized Data Sources
summary: Large Language Models (LLMs) have shown great promise in automating data analytics tasks by interpreting natural language queries and generating multi-operation execution plans. However, existing LLM-agent-based analytics frameworks operate under the assumption of centralized data access, offering little to no privacy protection.
